GRAPHIC_DESIGN

visual language creation and symbolic communication

STATUS
projects 18
discipline graphic_design
status active
last_update jan_2025
philosophy_06

graphic design translates complex ideas into visual language—communicating meaning through typography, color, and form.

every element serves communication, creating hierarchies of information that guide perception and understanding.
